title: VR/MR-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Enhancing Creativity (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic instructional design concepts and experience with VR/MR devices
context.additional_context: Training on utilizing a creativity-supporting system for developing instructional design scenarios in science subjects.

learning_goals: Identify and apply three or more creative expansion elements for science instructional design scenarios in VR/MR environments.
Generate instructional design ideas improved by over 20% compared to traditional methods using an MR-based creativity support system.
Explain creativity-enhancing strategies by analyzing the balance between concentration and rest in VR/MR environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
